channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SuccessFactors -- SAP SuccessFactors Mobile Application for Android & iOS devices
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SuccessFactors -- SAP SuccessFactors Mobile Application for Android & iOS devices

item.title: CVE-2022-35291|2024-08-03T09:36:43.436Z -- sap%20successfactors -- sap%20successfactors%20mobile%20application%20for%20android%20%26%20ios%20devices
item.description: Due to misconfigured application endpoints, SAP SuccessFactors attachment APIs allow attackers with user privileges to perform activities with admin privileges over the network. These APIs were consumed in the SF Mobile application for Time Off, Time Sheet, EC Workflow, and Benefits. On successful exploitation, the attacker can read/write attachments. Thus, compromising the confidentiality and integrity of the application
